item.title: Uncertainty Quantification of Large Language Models
item.description: Introduction this is the introduction of uncertainty quantification Results hello world import random def hello(): print("hello") def world(): print("world") if __name__ == "__main__": for _ in range(10): if random.random() < 0.5: hello() else: world() Conclusion hello world $$a^2 + b^2 = c^2$$
